name: virtualmixerproject
description: Build your own video mixers in javascript.

scripts.docs: node node_modules/jsdoc/jsdoc public/javascripts/src/* -c config/jsdoc.config.json -R README.md --debug ; cp docs/reference/*.* public/docs/reference/ -r ; open docs/reference/index.html
scripts.help:
echo 'use: $npm run [SCRIPT]

start	Starts the application,
build	builds and minifies the application
docs	writes the documentation
test	is sadly empty
help	this file'

author: XangadiX
